Chap. 5 - The Fanatical Mind

[NOTE: WEBSTER DEFINES FANATICISM AS "EXCESSIVE ENTHUSIASM" OR "UNREASONING ZEAL."--COMPILERS.]

     Fanatics and Fanaticism Will Press In.--We are living in a time when every phase of fanaticism will press its way in among believers and unbelievers. Satan will come in, speaking lies in hypocrisy. Everything that he can invent to deceive men and women will be brought forward.--Lt 121, 1901. (MM 114.)
